Thanks very much. 
From: Sigrid McCawley <I 
Sent: Tuesday, March 3, 2020 5:18 PM

Cc: 
Subject: RE: Epstein investigation
Yes. We will be there at 2:00 for the interview. Thanks. 
Sigrid McCawley

Hi Sigrid, 
Just confirming our meeting tomorrow —  does 2 p.m. still work for you? 
Thanks very much, 
From: Sigrid McCawley <

From: 
Sent: Tuesday, February 25, 2020 11:43 AM 
To: Sigrid McCawley 
Cc 
Subject: Re: Epstein investigation 
1
CAUTION: External email. Please do not 
respond to or click on links/attachments unless you recognize the sender. 
Sigrid, 
That works for us, thanks very much — we'll plan for 2:00 on the 4th. 
And the street address is 1 St. Andrews Plaza, though for purposes of using Google Maps, it's often easier to get directions 
to 5 Centre Street — if you let her know the building is through an archway and just to the left of a very large outdoor red 
sculpture. And of course she should feel free to calm us if she needs any assistance with directions or transportation. 
Thanks, 
On Feb 25, 2020, at 09:03, Sigrid McCawley < wrote: 
Hello M, 
I spoke to and she and I can meet with you on Wednesday, March 4th at 2:00 p.m. Please confirm that works 
for your team. Can you also please send me the street address for your building so I can get that to 
Best, 
Sigrid 
Sigrid McCawley 
Partner 
BOIES SCHILLER FLEXNER LLP 
EFTA00025126

401 E. Las Olas Blvd. Suite 1200 
Fort Lauderdale, FL, 33301 
www.bsfllp.com
From: 
Sent: Monday, February 24, 2020 4:45 PM 
To: Sigrid McCawley 
Cc 
Subject: RE: Epstein investigation
1 
CAUTION: External email. Please do not respond to or click on links/attachments unless you recognize the sender. 
Sigrid, 
Thank you again for speaking with us this afternoon, we appreciate it. As discussed, we wanted to follow up with you 
via email about a possible meeting with Ms. —it sounded like it might be convenient to do a meeting next 
week while you're in New York, if that would work for her? If so, if you could give us the dates and time ranges that 
might be possible, we can coordinate on scheduling on our end as well. And of course as always we're happy to address 
any questions that you or she might have in advance. 
thanks very much, 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
The information contained in this electronic message is confidential information intended only for the use of the named recipient(s) and may contain information 
that, among other protections. is the subject of attorney-client privilege, attorney work product or exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If the reader of this 
electronic message is not the named recipient, or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the named recipient. you are hereby notified that any 
dissemination. distribution. copying or other use of this communication is strictly prohibited and no privilege is waived. If you have received this communication in 
error. please immediately notify the sender by replying to this electronic message and then deleting this electronic message from your computer. (v.1
